channel.title: Tennis on Alan Yeung
channel.description: Recent content in Tennis on Alan Yeung

item.title: Rafa 21 Grand Slams and gganimate
item.description: I’ve been a Nadal fan for a long time – right back to the days of the pirate-pants so yeah, really a long time. In all this time, Rafa has never been ahead in the grand slam race vs his biggest rivals… but that finally changed after the 2022 Australian Open! The win there was unexpected and came out of nowhere. The final against Medvedev has to go down as one of the best comebacks ever.
